name: March 2 Infinity - Hope I
description:
Hope.

"The green wide open landscape made them hopeful.
The march to infinity they entered ages ago was coming to a final end it seemed.
The destination of a new life within reach.
“Only the last barriers to be taken …” the new evangelists chanted.
The countless victims upon the path to eternal life almost forgotten.
The sins of the world almost forgiven.
Hope."


1/1 Duo Paintings - 1 Traditional and 1 VQGAN based upon that traditional.

By Sedas. Part of Art Series - March 2 Infinity - The March to Infinity had departed. Will Humanity make the right choices ? 
See our website - https://mod.sedas.be/artseries/march2infinity/
